org.sobotics.chatexchange.chat

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sobotics.chatexchange.chat.User

  • public final class User
extends Object
    This class represents a chat user. Users having a negative id are system users (like Feeds).

    A user is inherently linked to a chat room: an instance of User can only be obtained by calling Room.getUser(long), or by retrieving the user of a message with Message.getUser()}. The same Stack Exchange user can have different properties depending on the chat room it was obtained with, like being a room owner or not.

    Author:
    Tunaki

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getId()
      Returns the id of this user.
      Instant getLastMessageDate()
      Returns the last date at which this user posted a message in the room (UTC).
      Instant getLastSeenDate()
      Returns the last date at which this user was seen in the room (UTC).
      String getName()
      Returns the display name of this user.
      String getProfileLink()
      Returns a link to the chat user profile of this user.
      int getReputation()
      Returns the amount of reputation this user has.
      boolean isCurrentlyInRoom()
      Tells whether this user is currently in this room or not.
      boolean isModerator()
      Tells whether this user is a moderator.
      boolean isRoomOwner()
      Tells whether this user is a room owner.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Returns the id of this user. This can be negative in case of system users.
        Returns:
        Id of this user.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the display name of this user.
        Returns:
        Display name of this user.

      • getReputation

        public int getReputation()
        Returns the amount of reputation this user has. In case of system users, this will be 0.
        Returns:
        Amount of reputation this user has.

      • isModerator

        public boolean isModerator()
        Tells whether this user is a moderator.
        Returns:
        Is this user a moderator?

      • isRoomOwner

        public boolean isRoomOwner()
        Tells whether this user is a room owner.
        Returns:
        Is this user a room owner?

      • getLastSeenDate

        public Instant getLastSeenDate()
        Returns the last date at which this user was seen in the room (UTC). This will be null in the case of users that never joined the room.
        Returns:
        Last date at which this user was seen in the room (UTC).

      • getLastMessageDate

        public Instant getLastMessageDate()
        Returns the last date at which this user posted a message in the room (UTC). This will be null in the case of users that never joined the room.
        Returns:
        Last date at which this user posted a message in the room (UTC).

      • isCurrentlyInRoom

        public boolean isCurrentlyInRoom()
        Tells whether this user is currently in this room or not.
        Returns:
        Currently in the room or not.

      • getProfileLink

        public String getProfileLink()
        Returns a link to the chat user profile of this user. Note that it is distinct from the main user profile.
        Returns:
        Link to the chat user profile.
